    # Font availability

    The table below indicates the font styles Lingua includes for each script.

    Script Sans Sans VF Serif Serif VF Sans UI Sans UI VF

    Devanagari Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes
    Gurmukhi Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes
